doc.after: Before the introduction of jet bridges passengers normally boarded an aircraft by walking along the ground level ramp and climbing a set of movable stairs or up airstairs on aircraft so equipped Mobile staircases or ramp stairs are employed at many airports around the world particularly smaller airports and terminals supporting low cost carriers
